text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del mou sa ban pol towkean krom robsa keat tha ao krom robsakhnhom. puok anak pitchea ban bampean leu khluoneng daoy yk roubsaamnak kaunko mk korp sakkar . hetonih chaur puok anak sarphap kamhosa champoh mcheasa robsa puok anak ruoch puok anak trauv samleab khluoneng( daoy samleab knea towvinhtowmk) . kar thveu dau che neah vea chea kar brasaer samreab puok anak nowchampohmoukh mcheasa robsa puok anak .( bae puok anak thveu ban dau che neah) trong pitchea aphytosa aoy puok anak . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anak ttuol yk kar sarphap kamhosa chea anak anet sraleanh bamphot
